trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
SetRadarUpgrade(1)
PlayCustomMusic("QuietDialogue01")
RuleConsole("cinematic_spring_coeff 1.7")
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId()
TActivate("cinDoctorOut_FadeIn")
Fly("StartGame_cam0", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 21, 1, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam1", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 10, 0, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam2", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 10, 0, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam3", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 5, 0, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam4", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 5, 0, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam5", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 10, 0, 0 ) Fly("StartGame_cam6", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 3, 0, 1 ) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam1" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam2" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam3" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam4" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam5" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam6" ) TActivate( "cinDoctorOut_end" )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_FadeIn
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
SetWeather (0) SetGameTime (12,0)
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_new_hero", "humPlayer", -1, -1, CVector(3388.285, 342.506, 292.459), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.2840, 0.0000, 0.9588), 0) CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_vincent", "doc1", -1, -1, CVector(3387.748, 342.506, 293.654), Quaternion(0.0000, 0.7163, 0.0000, 0.6978), 0)
AddCinematicMessage( 100, 2.5) AddCinematicMessage( 101, 0.25 ) AddCinematicMessage( 102, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam1
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_RESERVED1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_RESERVED1, AT_RESERVED1) end
AddCinematicMessage( 103, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam2
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND1, AT_STAND1) end
local humPl = GetEntityByName("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:SetNodeAction(AT_PAIN1) humPl:SetNextForAnimation(AT_PAIN1, AT_PAIN2) end
AddCinematicMessage( 104, 0.75 ) AddCinematicMessage( 105, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam3
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_RESERVED1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_RESERVED1, AT_RESERVED1) end
local humPl = GetEntityByName ("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
CreateNewDummyObject( "dweller_new_hero", "humPlayer1", -1, -1, CVector(3399.573, 342.506, 284.772), Quaternion(0.0000, -0.6724, 0.0000, 0.7402), 0)
AddCinematicMessage( 106, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam4
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND1, AT_STAND1) end
local humPl1 = GetEntityByName("humPlayer1") if humPl1 then humPl1:SetNodeAction(AT_PAIN1) humPl1:SetNextForAnimation(AT_PAIN1, AT_PAIN2) end
AddCinematicMessage( 107, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam5
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_RESERVED1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_RESERVED1, AT_RESERVED1) end
local humPl1 = GetEntityByName("humPlayer1") if humPl1 then humPl1:Remove() end
AddCinematicMessage( 108, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_cam6
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local docml = getObj("doc1") if docml then docml:SetNodeAction(AT_STAND1) docml:SetNextForAnimation(AT_STAND1, AT_STAND1) end
AddCinematicMessage( 109, 0.25 )

trigger.Name: cinDoctorOut_end
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
GameFiltersUse()
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local humPl1 = GetEntityByName("humPlayer1") if humPl1 then humPl1:Remove() end
local humPl = GetEntityByName ("humPlayer") if humPl then humPl:Remove() end
local docml = GetEntityByName ("doc1") if docml then docml:Remove() end
TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_FadeIn" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam1" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam2" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam3" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam4" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam5" ) TDeactivate( "cinDoctorOut_cam6" )
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetRotation(Quaternion(0.061, -0.174, 0.007, 0.983)) end
TakeQuest("r7m1_LampToMayak_Quest") AddQuestItem("quest_letter_lamp")
getObj("Mayak"):SetNodeAction(AT_MOVE1)
StopPlayingCustomMusic()
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
TActivate( "trTutotialStart" )

trigger.Name: cinFirstBandit
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
PlayCustomMusic("Battle02")
RuleConsole("cinematic_spring_coeff 1.7")
CreateTeam("FirstBandit1", 1105, CVector(3082.270, 256.448, 472.329), {"r1m1_sml01"})
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId()
Fly("FirstBandit_cam0", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 5, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate( "cinFirstBandit_FadeIn" ) TActivate( "cinFirstBandit_End" )

trigger.Name: cinFirstBandit_FadeIn
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local Bnd = getObj("FirstBandit1_vehicle_0") if Bnd then Bnd:setGodMode(1) Bnd:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(3082.270, 256.448, 472.329)) Bnd:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.007, 0.388, -0.063, -0.919)) Bnd:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 40 ) Bnd:SetThrottle( 1 ) Bnd:SetExternalPathByName("FirstBandit_path0") end
local vehPl = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPl then vehPl:setGodMode(1) vehPl:SetPosition(CVector(3131.734, 255.923, 616.053)) vehPl:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.001, 0.808, -0.002, -0.589)) end

trigger.Name: cinFirstBandit_End
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local Bnd = getObj("FirstBandit1_vehicle_0") if Bnd then Bnd:setGodMode(0) Bnd:SetExternalPathByName("FirstBandit_path0") Bnd:PlaceToEndOfPath() end
local vehPl = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPl then vehPl:setGodMode(0) end
TDeactivate( "cinFirstBandit_FadeIn" )
RuleConsole("cinematic_spring_coeff 0.7")
TActivate( "FirstBanditDie" )

trigger.Name: FirstBanditDie
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
StopPlayingCustomMusic()

trigger.Name: cinTruckTreasure
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
RuleConsole("cinematic_spring_coeff 1.7")
CreateVehicleEx("UralTreasure","vehSeller",( CVector(0, 10000, 0) )) CreateNewDummyObject( "cargo", "CamTochka", -1, -1, CVector(719.902, 259.323, 800.587), Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 0), 0)
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehSeller") local vehPID = vehP:GetId() local CToch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka") local CTochID = CToch:GetId()
Fly("TruckTre_cam0", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 12, 1, 0 ) FlyLinked( "TruckTre_cam1", CTochID, 17, 0, 1, vehPID ) StartCinematic()
TActivate( "cinTruckTreasure_FadeIn" ) TActivate( "cinTruckTreasure_cam01" ) TActivate( "cinTruckTreasure_End" )

trigger.Name: cinTruckTreasure_FadeIn
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local vehPlayer = GetPlayerVehicle() if vehPlayer then vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) vehPlayer:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(getPos("PlayerHideTruck_loc"))) vehPlayer:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.002, -0.916, 0.000, -0.401)) vehPlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetThrottle( 0 ) vehPlayer:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
AddCinematicMessage(201, 0.25)

trigger.Name: cinTruckTreasure_cam01
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehSeller") if vehP then vehP:SetGamePositionOnGround( CVector(569.827, 256.701, 1216.539)) vehP:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.000, 0.858, -0.003, 0.514)) vehP:SetExternalPathByName("TruckTreasure") end
AddCinematicMessage(202, 0.25)

trigger.Name: cinTruckTreasure_End
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local vehP = GetEntityByName("vehSeller") local Toch = GetEntityByName("CamTochka")
if vehP then vehP:Remove() end if Toch then Toch:Remove() end
CreateTeam("Seller", 1105, CVector(850.444, 256.701, 589.806), {"UralTreasure"})
TDeactivate( "cinTruckTreasure_FadeIn" ) TDeactivate( "cinTruckTreasure_cam01" ) TActivate("trDieTruckTr")
CompleteQuest("r7m1_ZasadaTr_Quest")
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()

trigger.Name: cinAfterTruckTre
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 )
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
FlyAround(2, 0, 25, 27, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1 ) StartCinematic()
TActivate("cinAfterTruckTre_FadeIn") TActivate("cinAfterTruckTre_End")

trigger.Name: cinAfterTruckTre_FadeIn
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( true ) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity( 0 ) Plf:SetThrottle( 0 ) Plf:SetCustomControlEnabled( false ) end
AddCinematicMessage(203, 1.0) AddCinematicMessage(204, 0.25) AddCinematicMessage(205, 0.25)

trigger.Name: cinAfterTruckTre_End
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
TDeactivate("cinAfterTruckTre_FadeIn")
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
